bibl.title: The New Simonides. Contexts of Praise and Desire.
bibl.note: Several chapters were first presented at panels on "The New Simonides" in Atlanta, Georgia (1994) and in Oxford (1997). - Part I: Deborah BOEDEKER and David SIDER, Introduction, pp. 3-6; - Photographs of P. Oxy. XXII, 2327 [= Pack2 1750] and LIX, 3965, pp. 7-12; - David SIDER, Fragments 1-22 W2 [I.E.G. II2, Simonides, 1-22]: Text, Apparatus Criticus, and Translation, pp. 13-29. - Part II. 18 contributions.
bibl.seg: BOEDEKER Deborah and David SIDER (Edd.), The New Simonides. Contexts of Praise and Desire.
Oxford, Oxford University Press, 2001, 8°, xii-312 pp., 5 pll. ISBN 0-19-513767-1. £48.

Several chapters were first presented at panels on "The New Simonides" in Atlanta, Georgia (1994) and in Oxford (1997). - Part I: Deborah BOEDEKER and David SIDER, Introduction, pp. 3-6; - Photographs of P. Oxy. XXII, 2327 [= Pack2 1750] and LIX, 3965, pp. 7-12; - David SIDER, Fragments 1-22 W2 [I.E.G. II2, Simonides, 1-22]: Text, Apparatus Criticus, and Translation, pp. 13-29. - Part II. 18 contributions.

C.R. par Alain Blanchard, REG 115 (2002) pp. 440-441. - Bonnie MacLachlan, AJP 123 (2002) pp. 516-521. - Gregory Nagy, CR N.S., 55 (2005) pp. 407-409. - R. Bertolín, AHB 18 (2004) Nos 1-2, pp. 99-100.
